item.title: How to Solve the Serpent Puzzle in Indiana Jones and The Order of Giants
item.description:
Indiana Jones has faced many adversaries and puzzles, but it seems his latest one in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants , has him come up against a mixture of his greatest fears: a puzzle that involves a giant serpent. This water-based puzzle will take quite a bit of thinking power, as players must find a way to make the water currents all flow into their locking mechanisms. Below, players can find the appropriate solution to the Serpent Puzzle so that they can continue on their adventure for this Indiana Jones DLC.

Serpent Puzzle Solution for Indiana Jones and the Order of Giants

The Serpent Puzzle requires players to use a Serpent Wrench to redirect the water flow into four drains, but to begin, players must first open up parts of the maze by directing the water through the grates. Below, players can find the solution in each part that will be available in:

How to Open the First Grate in the Serpent Puzzle

  • Take the Serpent Wrench and place it into the first north circle closest to the waterfall.
  • Rotate this hole so that it's flowing to the right, which will open up the grate and lift it from the floor.

How to Open the Second Gate in the Serpent Puzzle

  • With the first grate now opened, head to the first water hole on the east, and use a Serpent Wrench to make the water flow upwards.
  • Where the water now flows, make the hole face east so that it will flow down into the next grate, which should now open up.

How to Open the Third Grate in the Serpent Puzzle

  • With the second grate now opened, use the first hole on the right from the waterfall to make the water flow south.
  • The water hole to the west of the waterfall will now be filled, and players can insert the Serpent Wrench to direct the water further west, which will open up the third grate.

How to Open the Fourth Grate in the Serpent Puzzle

  • The final water hole that opened the third grate can now be turned so that the water flow is facing north and east. This will open up the last grate.

How to Solve the Serpent Puzzle

Now that all grates have been opened, it's time to turn all of the water holes the appropriate way. The image above shows exactly how players will want each water hole to face so that the flow opens all 4 locks on the exit door, but here's a brief rundown:

  • Direct B3 to C3 and B2
  • Direct water from B2 to B1 and A2
  • Direct water from A2 to A1 and A3
  • Direct water from B1 to C1
  • Direct water from C1 to C2
  • Direct water from C2 to D2
  • Direct water from D2 to D4
  • Direct water from D4 to E4
  • Direct water from E4 to D1
  • Direct water from E1 to D1
  • Direct C4 to C3 and B4
  • Direct B4 to B5
  • Direct B5 to A4 and E5

item.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Teasing New Generation 6 Mega Evolution
item.description:
On September 4, Pokemon Legends: Z-A posted a strange video that showed trainers going crazy over Malamar, which could indicate the sixth-generation critter may receive a Mega Evolution in the upcoming title. While past Pokemon Legends: Z-A leaks indicated that Malamar would receive a Mega Evolution form, The Pokemon Company has kept further details under wraps.

Known as the Overturning Pokemon, Malamar first appeared in Pokemon X and Y as the evolved form of Inkay. Malamar is a squid-like Dark and Psychic Pokemon that has a unique evolution method. After leveling an Inkay to 30, it can become a Malamar by turning the respective game console of the Pokemon game being played upside down. Though its base stats are average across the board, Malamar can learn the fittingly named move Topsy-Turvy to reverse the stat changes of its target and turn its power against it. Malamar can also use various attacks, such as Superpower, Night Slash, and Psybeam, to wear down its foes.

Pokemon Shares Strange Malamar Video Montage

One week after revealing Mega Hawlucha is coming to Pokemon Legends: Z-A , The Pokemon Company offered a short but strange video that focused entirely on Malamar. On Pokemon 's various social media feeds, the company posted a cryptic video titled "Malamar.mp4" that showed different people expressing their excitement over Malamar. One clip portrayed Malamar as a graffiti art mural, while another showed a man driving a car filled with several Malamar plush dolls and stickers. The third clip of the video showed another man dancing while wearing a Malamar shirt. In response to the surprising video post, Pokemon fans guessed that it was a tease for Mega Malamar, which would mark the second Gen 6 creature to receive a Mega form in Pokemon Legends: Z-A , following Mega Hawlucha's reveal.

The Pokemon Company did not share any further details related to Malamar. While not officially confirmed as of this writing, a previous leak that listed the new Pokemon Legends: Z-A Mega Evolutions included Malamar on the list of candidates. So far, the leaked Mega Evolution list is a perfect 3-for-3, as Mega Dragonite, Victreebel, and Hawlucha have been officially revealed in various videos.

However, 23 additional Mega Evolutions listed in the leaks have yet to be confirmed in any official capacity. With Pokemon Legends: Z-A 's October 16 release date fast approaching, it remains to be seen how many more Mega Evolutions will be revealed beforehand, and which ones will be left for players to discover in-game.

item.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Player Count is Way Up
item.description:
The player count for Dragon Age: The Veilguard has jumped by a staggering 1,525.88%. Dragon Age: The Veilguard first hit the scene last year after years of anticipation. While Dragon Age: The Veilguard earned mostly positive reviews, it was also criticized for its dialogue and tone compared to previous entries in the fan-favorite franchise. Ultimately, this backlash led to Dragon Age: The Veilguard failing to meet commercial expectations and support for the game ended not long after launch.

Since launch, EA has made a concerted effort to get Dragon Age: The Veilguard into the hands of as many players as possible. Dragon Age: The Veilguard has been heavily discounted in sales, and it has also been featured as a free PS Plus game. The latest move saw Dragon Age: The Veilguard join the Xbox Game Pass Ultimate lineup, and that in turn has contributed to a massive player count spike for the game.

Dragon Age: The Veilguard Player Count is Up By 1,525.88%

As reported by TrueAchievements, Dragon Age: The Veilguard 's player count is up by 1,525.88% since joining Game Pass. Additionally, the game has climbed to become the 33rd most-played Xbox game of the week. While an exact player count number is unavailable, this goes to show that there are many fans who were holding out for Dragon Age: The Veilguard to hit a service like Game Pass. Now, how many Game Pass subscribers will stick with The Veilguard to completion remains to be seen, but it's encouraging that so many people have decided to check it out, especially when one considers how stacked Game Pass has been lately.

While some fans may not be happy with certain choices made in Dragon Age: The Veilguard , it's still a very well-polished action-RPG with engaging combat, a story full of memorable moments, and eye-popping visuals. I personally had a great time with The Veilguard , and while it may not be my top Dragon Age game (nothing beats Origins , in my opinion), it's certainly worth a playthrough or two.

BioWare fans that have yet to check out Dragon Age: The Veilguard should definitely make sure to play it while it's available through Xbox Game Pass Ultimate if they're unwilling to purchase it outright. It brings closure to lingering Dragon Age plot threads and can be a good way to tide oneself over while waiting for the new Mass Effect game. The new Mass Effect is next from BioWare now that The Veilguard is out and done, and so fans can expect information on it to start coming to light in the months and years ahead.

item.title: Path of Exile 2: How to Reset Elder Madox's Uniques
item.description:
Elder Madox is an NPC in Path of Exile 2 who gives away a free Unique to any player who manages to locate him in the game, allowing them to choose a favorite from a random collection.

For those familiar with the endgame of PoE 2 , this works exactly like the Moment of Zens Nameless Seer. The only difference is that, unlike the Nameless Seer, Elder Madoxs stock can be rerolled. This guide covers how to find Elder Madox and how to refresh his stock of Uniques if you dont find anything worth taking.

Where to Find Elder Madox in Path of Exile 2

Elder Madox Location

Elder Madox can be found in Kriar Peaks in the Interludes of Path of Exile 2 . He is located in an isolated corner of the map along a narrow offbeat path near a checkpoint.

An easy way to find Elder Madox in Kriar Peaks is to look for the blue spirit birds near checkpoints (pictured below).

The ethereal blue spirit birds only appear when players are near Elder Madoxs location , with the very first one appearing right next to the checkpoint. Once you spot one of these birds, start exploring the nearby area to find the solitary path that leads to Elder Madox.

How to Reset Elder Madoxs Shop in Path of Exile 2

How to Reroll Elder Madoxs Uniques

Elder Madox lets players choose a free Unique item of their choice from a small random selection. These Uniques can be rerolled . However, the process to do so is fairly involved, as simply creating a new instance or waiting for the stock to refresh does nothing.

From our testing, the only way to reset Elder Madoxs shop is to raise the level of the Kriar Peaks map . To do so, youll need to complete two crucial steps:

  1. Increase the level of your character.
  2. Complete any quest in the game.

If the current level of Kriar Peaks is Level 56, for example, raising the level to 57 will reset all Uniques in Elder Madoxs stock. And the only confirmed way to do that is by both leveling up once and completing a quest . You can check the current level of Kriar Peaks by hovering over the map icon in the World Map screen.

Elder Madoxs Uniques can only be rerolled if you havent already received an item from him. If you have, there is no going back.

Note that Elder Madox can only offer Uniques from the global drop pool . Boss-exclusive Uniques like Morior Invictus or Temporalis cannot appear in his shop.

item.title: The Sims 4 Reveals New Features Coming in Adventure Awaits Expansion
item.description:
The Sims 4 has given fans their first glimpse at the Adventure Awaits pack, revealing its key features. Despite coming out over a decade ago, The Sims 4 is still going strong, as several DLC packs continue to be released for it every year. While this remains a controversial subject for many in its community, the game has high replayability value, and the additional content only heightens that fact, whether it's with kits, stuff packs, game packs, or expansion packs.

Even though the latest expansion pack, Enchanted by Nature, was released in July, a Sims 4 roadmap leaked in August revealed that another EP and various kits were already in the works. On September 2, EA confirmed the existence of an upcoming EP and announced that its first trailer would come out within a couple of days, making fans eager to learn more about what was to come.

New Sims 4 Features Included in the Adventure Awaits Expansion

  • Archery
  • Diving
  • Papercraft
  • Entomology
  • More gym equipment
  • More children's toys and games
  • Imaginary friends
  • New Competitive trait
  • Blender
  • Exercise classes
  • Butterfly catching
  • Custom venues
  • New profession (Camp Director)

On September 4, the trailer for Adventure Awaits, the previously leaked name for the expansion pack, went live at 11 AM ET, and fans got a proper look at the features that would be coming to the game on October 2. The Adventure Awaits expansion pack is bringing new skills to The Sims 4 , such as papercrafting, diving, archery, and entomology. It will also make it possible for players to build their getaway locations and assign rules to fully customize these builds, along with introducing more activities, especially for younger Sims.

The Adventure Awaits expansion pack is set in Gibbi Point, a new world with three lively neighborhoods, each with its own set of available activities and getaway locations. While the pack comes with its own getaways, it also allows players to make their own, something that Simmers who prefer Build Mode will surely love. Adventure Awaits allows players to make their own custom venues, which can be home to a getaway location, a summer camp for kids, or even a reality show house. The activities and rules that players set are what will bring these venues to life and define them.

To learn more about the Adventure Awaits expansion pack, players can watch the trailer and read the aforementioned announcement blog post, as the latter provides an even more detailed look at the game's upcoming features. Players can look forward to engaging with the new Sims 4 expansion pack when it releases on October 2.

Choose how Sims look, act, and dress, then decide how theyll live out each day. Design and build incredible homes for every family, then decorate with your favorite furnishings and dcor. Travel to different neighborhoods where you can meet other Sims and learn about their lives. Discover beautiful locations with distinctive environments and go on spontaneous adventures. Manage the ups and downs of Sims everyday lives, and see what happens when you play out scenarios from your own real life. Tell your stories your way while developing relationships, pursuing careers and life aspirations, and immersing yourself in this extraordinary game, where the possibilities are endless
